name: Kardia Info
description: Kardia info aims to clear this confusion by providing a single ‘go-to’ website on which the most up-to-date and accurate information about all the projects on KardiaChain can be found in a simple and intuitive fashion. Though it must be noted, the website’s functionalities do not end with the provision of an unrivalled quality of information. It will also issue its own token (INFO), which will be able to provide users with a store of value on both the short and the long run as well as a series almost unprecedented use cases that will make the Info Token the best investment in KardiaChain ecosystem. The main goal for Kardia info is to become the central hub for all information regarding KardiaChain and for the Info Token to become a part of every KAI investors portfolio, making them consistent gains.
